entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
